mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.parent_id AS "parent.id", a.parent_ids AS "parentIds", a.name AS "name", a.in_menu AS "inMenu", a.sort AS "sort", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM industry a
a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}
AND a.parent_id = #{parent.id}
AND (a.parent_ids LIKE '%'||#{topLevelId}||'%' '%'+#{topLevelId}+'%' concat('%',#{topLevelId},'%') or a.id = #{topLevelId})
AND a.parent_ids LIKE '%'||#{parentIds}||'%' '%'+#{parentIds}+'%' concat('%',#{parentIds},'%')
ORDER BY a.sort ASC

SELECT
FROM industry a
a.parent_id in (#{parentIds})
ORDER BY a.sort ASC
SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(id) FROM industry WHERE parent_id in (#{parentIds})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO industry( id, parent_id, parent_ids, name, in_menu, sort, create_date, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{parent.id}, #{parentIds}, #{name}, #{inMenu}, #{sort}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE industry SET parent_id = #{parent.id}, parent_ids = #{parentIds}, name = #{name}, in_menu = #{inMenu}, sort = #{sort}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
DELETE FROM industry WHERE id = #{id} OR FIND_IN_SET(#{id},parent_ids)
